body_html: There's a decent chance that this hanging bug was fixed by the upgrade to a more recent version of gRPC, which addresses a race condition (leading to potential deadlock) in grpc::CompletionQueue. I'm closing this in the hope that things are now working at HEAD and in the nightly builds; please reopen if you can reproduce with an up-to-date version of TensorFlow.

body: There's a decent chance that this hanging bug was fixed by the upgrade to a more recent version of gRPC, which addresses a race condition (leading to potential deadlock) in `grpc::CompletionQueue`. I'm closing this in the hope that things are now working at HEAD and in the nightly builds; please reopen if you can reproduce with an up-to-date version of TensorFlow.
